Events that occurred on 10 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1943 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 51b.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 174.
1958 - C. S. Lewis writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien.
1963 - Hobbits and Heroes, which includes extracts of an interview with J.R.R. Tolkien, is published in The Sunday Telegraph.
1968 - The Gathering of the Clouds, the seventh episode of the 1968 radio series of The Hobbit, is aired on BBC Radio.
2003 - Secret Fire: The Spiritual Vision of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
2006 - Ring*Con 2006 in Fulda, Germany.
2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in France.
2021 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Fate of Gundabad expansion is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 2994:
Balin, Lord of Moria, is killed by an Orc archer as he stood to watch in Mirrormere.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
